about_the_game:
The Doors are a gambling clicker for memorization and luck. Suitable for all ages. Click on the doors and collect the crystals before the time runs out. To see what is hiding behind the doors – roll the dice, they will open the randomly dropped number of doors. Remember what's behind them, and open others at your own risk.

Behind the doors can be: crystals, various enemies, or advantages in the form of additional dice rolls, time, health and treasure.

Nice graphics and sounds create a relaxing atmosphere. Complete all 20 levels! With each level, the number of doors increases, there are more enemies, there are closed doors to which you need to look for keys! At the same time, the game remains both challenging and relaxing at the same time!
For every 10,000 points, a mini bonus game is given. Score as many points as possible so that everyone knows that you are the best in the game!!!

Nice graphics and sounds create a relaxing atmosphere. Complete all 20 levels! With each level, the number of doors increases, there are more enemies, there are closed doors to which you need to look for keys! At the same time, the game remains both challenging and relaxing at the same time!

name: The Doors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium CPU G860
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 840M
  • Storage: 125 МБ MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 840M
  • Storage: 125 МБ MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: This is a gambling and exciting clicker for memorization and luck. Click on the doors and collect all the crystals before the time runs out. Roll the dice. It will open the randomly dropped number of doors. Remember what's behind them, open others at your own risk.
